(5, 1) [ 11111111111111111111 ] ERROR: an out of range integer
(5, 1) [ 11111111111111111111 ] ERROR: an out of range integer
(14, 1) [ "abcde	g" ] ERROR: an invalid string with tab in it
(17, 1) [ "abcde			g" ] ERROR: an invalid string with many tabs in it

(44, 1) [  ] ERROR: a bad character (bell)
(50, 1) [ "abc
 ] ERROR: an unterminated string
(52, 1) [ "abc(**)
 ] ERROR: an unterminated string
(54, 1) [ "abc(*123*)
 ] ERROR: an unterminated string
